embed.description: this is the champion that riot considers more OP than gamebreaking fizz/akali/Katarina/zed she is so gamebreaking I beat her while running 0-0-0 masteries and got my adc 3 kills in 3 minutes

replies.body:
...So someone who chose one of the few SPECIFIC counters to Sona and landed her skillshot all in, with a high damage earlygame carry, was able to kill a squishy support and weak early adc.

Wow, who would have guessed this would happen TO LITERALLY ANYONE in this situation?

Umm...

Everyone counters Sona.

EVERYONE.

Just to be clear here is a list of champions that counter Sona:
